Paper Reading

“Why You Hate Literature Review and 7 Ways to Fix It” by Thomas Deetjen at Productive Academic

I’ve used multiple note taking softwares for compiling my research & literature notes over the years but I currently use Notesnook since it’s open source. I also really like Obsidian.
